item.title: A Comprehensive Beginner's Guide to Penetration Testing Tools & Techniques
item.dc:creator: SimeonOnSecurity
item.category: "penetration testing" , "cybersecurity" , "ethical hacking" , "tools" , "techniques" , "beginner's guide" , "Nmap" , "Metasploit" , "Wireshark" , "Burp Suite" , "OSSTMM" , "PTES" , "OWASP" , "CEH" , "OSCP" , "GPEN" , "security testing" , "vulnerability assessment" , "network security" , "information security"
